It's not that I wonder
No I'm not Impressed
You gained some cheap respect

But now it's time to collapse
Surprise! No, I'm not dead yet

Overrated
Someone Got Identity
And Now You Fake It
You Created A Chain
And I'd Love To Break It
Concepts You Bite
Cause Your Identity Ain't Tight
...

The irony of process
You just sit there,
Watching yourself from nothingness
Thinking of nothing specific

It is hard
To imagine a Philosophy
By someone
Who might not even be able to think
...

Your mouth is full of shit
and you "spread the word" like hell
your message board tourette syndrome
prooves that you are nothing, son!

everything you claim to be
is fake and a fucking joke to me

It's so cold here
And dark
There has been a war for years
Behind closed doors

Not even a half-hearted try
To pu weapons down
It's raining lead
And as always, the wrong ones die

...

I Set The Curse
For My Redemption
And I'll Never Be In League
With The Devil... You... Bitch!
On A Fast Track To A New Chapter Of
My Life
Glare Lights Depressing The Senses
...

Too Many Set Phrases
Too Many Envier
Too Many People
That Don't Get It
...

Do You See The Mines
Paving My Way?
I Avoid Them
Resisting The Force Pulling Me
Down
Rip The Noose
Regain Strength
...

The mechanical heart, it beats
Underneath this rainy sky
The machines produce more and more
People without dreams, losers

Every day we encounter
Their lethargic faces
